name: Breakfast Is Ready
description:
Oh no! The goblins are invading. You must defend the castle at any cost. The King needs you. Luckily you have a Chefgician mother, who can transport all the food you need to boost up your energy.  Milk, fried egg, burger, or even that delicious yummy ice cream will help you out.

Don't forget to collect all those coins too, young knight. You may need them to purchase all kinds of costumes and weapons to help you. As the royal spy already whispers, this time the goblins are all out. Giant goblin, crossbow goblin, and even that deadly catapult will be there to challenge you.

Control : WASD / Gamepad / Virtual Joystick
